"}]}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 3, "value": "composite", "label": "Composite"}, "benefits": [{"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Stipend", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "For S&T section/wing interns: \u20b9 5,000/- per month"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "For non-S&T section/wing interns: \u20b9 3,000/- per month"}]}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The stipend shall be paid after the completion of the Internship on submission of a report duly accepted by NIELIT Haridwar. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The stipend shall be paid in non-cash mode only via Cheque/NEFT/RTGS etc. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Certificate", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Certificates will be issued by NIELIT Haridwar to the interns on completion of the Internship and submission of the Report duly countersigned by the supervisor/mentor and accepted by the Wing/Section Head.

org)Candidates shortlisted from these platforms shall be considered for the selection process only on producing the recommendation/endorsement letter from the sponsoring institution. **Step 2:** The eligible applications received will be scrutinized by the Wing/Section Head to shortlist suitable candidates for the selection process on the basis of the candidate’s merit and NIELIT’s requirement.
**NOTE 1:** Applications received with endorsement/recommendation by Sponsoring Institutions shall only be considered for the selection process. **NOTE 2:** NIELIT may conduct a Test/Personal or Interviews, as necessary for the selection of Interns.

ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "A maximum of five (05) interns shall be engaged for non - the S&T section at NIELIT Haridwar in a financial year. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Confidentiality Protocol", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The Intern shall follow the confidentiality protocol of NIELIT Haridwar and shall not reveal to any person or organization confidential information relating to NIELIT, its work and its policies. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Placement", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Every batch of interns or individual interns, as the case may be, will have a Scientific/Technical Project Supervisor/Mentor to be appointed by the Wing/Section Head of NIELIT Haridwar. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The internship is neither an employment nor an assurance of employment.
